global.description: global values that are shared between korifi and all subcharts

debug.description: run the dlv command and expose debugging ports

containerRepositoryPrefix.description: the repository prefix of the registry where droplet images are pushed to

containerRegistryBase.description: the part of the container registry image ref identifying the registry.

containerRegistrySecret.description: name of the secret containing credentials to access the container registry. Required if eksContainerRegistryRoleARN not set. Ignored if eksContainerRegistryRoleARN is set

eksContainerRegistryRoleARN.description: amazon resource name (ARN) of the IAM role to use to access the container registry. Required if containerRegistrySecret not set

include.description: determines if this subchart is included in the korifi chart

replicas.description: number of replicas in the deployment

clusterBuilderName.description: If blank, let korifi create a default cluster builder. If not blank, this is the name of the cluster builder that has been created outside of korifi

builderRepository.description: The name to use for the cluster builder docker image path when korifi is creating the cluster builder
